articles.title: Turkish wildfires burn out of control as local officials plead for help - The Washington Post
articles.description: The European Union and neighboring countries sent planes to assist with firefighting on Monday.
articles.content:
Rescuers raced to save animals as livestock were burned alive. Satellite photos showed vast areas of once verdant coastline blackened by the inferno.
